pages.text: A stick with [#](bb00bb)Sugar[#]() on it.\\...wait wait wait, there's more to it!\If you place this stick so that its underside is immersed in [Liquid Crystal](book://magical_blocks/liquid_crystal), you just have to slowly dissolve more Sugar in the liquid until the stick turns into a sweet-crunchy candy stick.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: You might even be able to add more stuff than just plain Sugar when immersed? Liquid _Crystal_ and all that...

pages.title: Growing Rock Candy
pages.text: [#](449900)Silk Touch[#]() keeps their size for use as fancy lights, or just for storage.

pages.title: Gemstone Rock Candy
pages.text: Dissolving [Gemstone Powder](book://general/gemstone_powder) instead of Sugar in the liquid allowed the Rock Candy to take on the gemstone's typical color.\\You always wanted to know what those taste like. Definitely seems like a healthier option than snorting them up your nose.
